text: Chapters of the AfD are considered right-wing "extremist" groups by Germany's domestic intelligence service. Kay Nietfeld Jan 9, 2025 Jan 9, 2025 Updated 1 hr ago Facebook Twitter WhatsApp SMS Email Print Copy article link Save Chapters of the AfD are considered right-wing "extremist" groups by Germany's domestic intelligence service. Kay Nietfeld Tags Partners/afp As featured on Musk promotes German far-right leader in latest European intervention US tech billionaire Elon Musk doubled down Thursday on his full-throated support for the far-right party Alternative for Germany (AfD), promoting its leader Alice Weidel during a livestream on X in his latest intervention in European politics.
